definition: the soft wavy or curly usually thick undercoat of various hairy mammals and especially the sheep made up of a matrix of keratin fibers and covered with minute scales
a product of wool
a dense felted pubescence especially on a plant : tomentum

a filamentous mass                                      
                
                  —usually used in combination
    
              
            
                                                  — compare mineral wool, steel wool
the soft, thick hair of sheep and some other animals
cloth or clothing made of wool
long, thick thread made of wool and used for knitting
soft wavy or curly usually thick hair especially of the sheep

a substance that looks like a mass of wavy hair                                      
             
             steel wool
a material (as yarn) made from wool

the wool from cashmere goats is considered by many to be the finest available
steel wool

definition: thick hair that grows on sheep and some other animals
fibre made from wool, used in knitting
cloth made from wool. Clothes that are made of wool are called woollen clothes
used for telling someone to calm down
in: a ball of wool
a wool jacket

definition: Used by people from Liverpool to describe people from outside the city, though specifically those from areas in close proximity such as the Wirral, St. Helens and parts of Cheshire and Lancashire. People from these areas with similar accents may pretend or act as if they are true Liverpudlians/Scousers.

Marginalized Orientations, Gender identities, And Intersex. it’s meant to be an all inclusive umbrella term for asexuals, homosexuals, multisexuals, trans people, and intersex people. Alternative to LGBTQIAP+
Alternative to MOGII, easier to pronounce.

A wool is short for the Liverpool term Wooly Back which is a derogatory expression for people from lancashire and cheshire, originating from the early 1900's when the population of lancashire used to wear a form of sheepskin coat and was considered to be a sheep shagger by scousers.

This of course has not changed much, except the lancashire and cheshire fashion sense has got worse

A wool is an uncouth person from the land of St. Helens. Some wools decide to span out and dress equally like us superior Scouse folk, but others choose to be less appealing. The girls all wear Diadora pants and Umbro jumpers hair tied up and huge loopy ear-rings, the lads wear similarly the same but Rockport boots. The lads will think they are hard and usually rabble rouse with the Scousers only to be beaten down and the girls are the most filthiest I have ever encountered. Basically it's not good to be a wool.
A woman (from the appearance of pubic hair); Pubic hair
Women, pussy, ass etc.....

Someone born on and who lives in the Wirral.
Or the name used for a victim, often chanted when something embarrassing happens.
